infranken.de.309656.14: In addition, the vast majority of those present adhered to the applicable infection protection regulations, in particular the observance of the minimum distance and the wearing of a mouth and nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The control measures carried out on site were completed around 1:00 a.m.
infranken.de.309656.16: In total, the officials found such structural changes in 10 vehicles that the operating permit had expired.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be seized.
infranken.de.309656.19: There were no illegal car races.
infranken.de.309656.20: "The Central Franconia police headquarters will continue to keep an eye on the events and will continue to carry out increased control measures, also in connection with the appearance of onlookers," it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The News5 agency spoke to Jürgen Schrödinger from the towing company involved: "They all have nice rims, we must not scratch them," said Schrödinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes would be used for this.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also because the cars are wider, the company has to be careful not to cause any damage.
infranken.de.309656.24: "After all, the young people should get their cars back undamaged."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Figures from the employment agency: 900 suspected cases of abuse in short-time work
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - According to its own statement, the Federal Employment Agency (BA) is investigating around 900 suspected cases of abuse of the short-time work allowance.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: "With more than 880,000 companies that have reported short-time working, this is extremely low," Daniel Terzenbach, the board member responsible for operations, told the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When a large number of companies suddenly applied for short-time work at the beginning of the corona crisis, the BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: Normally, the examination takes up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: "We didn't have that much time in this hot phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: We will therefore take a closer look at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will certainly be more to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naïve and we have a lot of stamina."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Indications of abuse often come from the affected employees or trade unions.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, the BA uses analysis software to detect patterns of abuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of insolvencies in the autumn.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: "Will there be significantly more insolvencies than in the previous year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: Estimates vary, but we are preparing for the eventuality and are already training our employees in the employment agencies to process applications for insolvency benefits."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The figures are still unremarkable, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party in the New Garden dissolved
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening, about 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The gathering was broken up at 8:48 p.m. by the rangers of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the foundation said in response to a request from PNN.
pnn.de.185998.4: The youths then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people played rugby in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow had been cleared by district drivers, said SPSG spokesman Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: Again and again there are illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the parks of the foundation, there are always gatherings in which the distance and hygiene rules of Covid-19 regulations are not observed.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June, there was a celebration with about 300 people in Babelsberg Park, and a week later about 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without a coronavirus order, the parks will be closed at nightfall.
pnn.de.185998.11: According to the park regulations, camping on the meadows is prohibited; there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for some time that visitors are leaving more and more rubbish behind and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: In Berlin, meanwhile, illegal park parties have reached another dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: In Hasenheide in the district of Neukölln, 5,000 people celebrated an illegal techno party on Sunday night.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was broken up by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass testing after corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, according to the state authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still pending in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: According to this, many of the infected are young interns in tourism companies, but at least one holiday guest has also tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism workers were asked to stay in their accommodation on Saturday night.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.7: The curfew was set at 11 p.m.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations" of bookings here and there, the head of the Wolfgangsee tourism association, Hans Wieser, told dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.9: A few guests also left early.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist resort in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, around a third of the guests are German.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: The first infections were publicly announced on Friday.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: The head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended on Saturday the behavior of the interns, who had partied in several restaurants and could have been infected there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: "We all liked to do that in our youth," he told the Ö1 radio station.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The tourist board launched an information campaign to make young employees aware of the dangers of Covid-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: From Saturday, hundreds of employees, holidaymakers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: In addition, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang from July 15 were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak brings back memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which was a centre for the spread of corona throughout Europe in the initial phase of the pandemic.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: In total, more than 1500 people are currently infected with the virus in Austria.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The focus of the new infections is Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualify for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (dpa) - English football's record champions Manchester United are returning to the Champions League after a one-year absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured third place in the table on the final day of the Premier League with a 2-0 (0-0) victory over direct rivals Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes now have to be content with the Europa League, because Chelsea FC still passed and also qualified for the premier class in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: In the fight against relegation, Aston Villa could celebrate.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead through a penalty from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in injury time, Jesse Lingard (90th+8) scored the final goal.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, Bayern's opponents in the Champions League round of 16, won 2-0 (2-0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers thanks to Mason Mount (45th+1) and Olivier Giroud (45th+4).
wn.de.700458.9: "This means a lot to me," said coach Frank Lampard, who in his first season as Chelsea coach is also in the final of the FA Cup against Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.10: Tottenham Hotspur also benefited from Chelsea's victory against Wolverhampton, edging past Wolves with a meagre 1:1 (1:0) at Crystal Palace and starting in sixth place in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with FC Watford and AFC Bournemouth, but had to tremble at West Ham United for a long time.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead of Jack Grealish (84th) was immediately offset by Andrei Yarmolenko (85th).
wn.de.700458.13: The 1:1 (0:0) was enough, however, because Watford lost 2:3 (1:3) at Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which fired three coaches during the season, is relegated after five years in the first division.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, who couldn't save themselves from a 3-1 (2-1) defeat at Everton.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool FC, who have been confirmed as English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1-1) victory at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points is the most the Reds have ever scored in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed out on the points record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: The record is held by Manchester City with 100 points in the 2017/18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After Newcastle took the lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th) turned the game around for Liverpool on Sunday.
wn.de.700458.22: "It has been an exceptional season for this wonderful club," said goalscorer van Dijk after the game, "which should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: The Premier League bosses are also likely to be satisfied in the end.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the coronavirus crisis, football in England was suspended from 13 March to 17 June.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there were even discussions about an early cancellation or a staging of the remaining games on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: In the end, however, the season could be played to the end without any particular incidents - but, as in Germany, without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at anti-Netanyahu demonstrations
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Prime Minister Netanyahu are becoming increasingly violent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: There were violent clashes during the night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: Israeli police violently cracked down on participants in a demonstration against right-wing conservative Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in Jerusalem on Sunday night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people were arrested for participating in riots, police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: The police used, among other things, water cannons to break up the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, a total of around 6,000 people had gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They were protesting against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration supporting Netanyahu were also arrested, the news site "ynet" reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the prime minister's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: A man was arrested near Tel Aviv on suspicion of spraying pepper spray from a moving car at protesters on the side of the road, police said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a knife attack on a protester in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The protester was slightly injured in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: There have been several demonstrations against Netanyahu in Jerusalem and Tel Aviv recently.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption trial against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Most recently, Netanyahu has also been criticized for his handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is accused of premature easing and a lack of preparation for a second corona wave.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The corona crisis has hit the country's economy hard.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate recently stood at more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the coronavirus in Israel recently rose to new record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (NRW) - Van crashes into car - nine injured - Ruhr area - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision on the B58 near Ahlen on Saturday afternoon left nine people with minor injuries.
bild.254850.3: A motorist was driving with her two children (3, 5) in the direction of Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: "Presumably she had braked suddenly because she wanted to turn."
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van, who was driving behind her, must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: Three passengers in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took them to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after suspected coronavirus case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen its own measures to ward off the coronavirus as a "shining success."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: Now the country is reporting a suspected case for the first time.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Due to a first official suspected case of coronavirus in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a major city for fear of a catastrophe.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological countermeasures over the past six months, "the malignant virus could have been introduced into the country," state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency has been declared for the region around the border city of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The communist leadership declared the highest level of alert.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: North Korea had not registered a single infection so far, according to its own information, and described its defensive measures as a "shining success."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The symptoms of the disease were reportedly detected in a "runaway" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person had defected to South Korea three years ago and had now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: There was initially no confirmation from South Korea of the border crossing within the four-kilometre-wide and largely still mined military buffer zone.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: South Korea's military, however, acknowledged the possibility of an illegal border crossing into North Korea as high, according to reports from the national news agency Yonhap.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: There were investigations into a number of people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: According to North Korea, an emergency meeting of the Politburo of the Workers' Party, chaired by leader Kim Jong Un, was called on Saturday because of the suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The "dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive disaster."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: As a preventive measure, Kim had already ordered on Friday to "completely block Kaesong and isolate each district and the region from others," it added.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The affected person, as well as all people in Kaesong who have had contact with her, have been quarantined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The party's central military commission is to investigate the "outlier case" as well as the conduct of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose severe punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: It is estimated that about 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension before council meeting: City East and noise protection are still up for discussion before the big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the large-scale project Innenstadtentwicklung-Ost," it says rather casually in the middle section of the municipal press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, 28 July, at 4.30 pm in the Great Hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: The upgrading of the eastern part of the city in particular, however, will be the subject of controversy until the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities in favour are narrow, most recently in some committees even negative, depending on the attendance.
pz-news.de.72354.5: An appeal from the economy (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project, which was developed out of the citizenry and then by the administration and the local council, fail after almost ten years of preparation, was criticized by project opponent Reinhard Klein as "extra-parliamentary opposition," "clueless," "speculation," "denigration" and "deliberate false statements."
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better," said Klein, who has been a member of the municipal council for a year as the only representative of the Pforzheim citizens' list.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the contracts, he is in this position: "I know what I am talking about."
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit is cheaper for the city, the Technical Town Hall is, contrary to statements by the city administration, to be renovated for 8.5 million euros after subsidies, of whose existence Klein is convinced.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop quite differently from what is predicted in the town hall and by the proponents from the business community.
pz-news.de.72354.10: To shape the city through its own strength and not an investor: that is his plan B. One day after Klein, the FDP/FW/UB/LED group, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: It essentially also provides for the renovation of the Technical Town Hall, the opening of the Schloßberg, the rental of the Ex-Thales for administrative areas and a smaller-scale inner-city transformation, ideally with local agencies.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: In addition, environmental issues in particular will play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the municipal council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the Pforzheim population from health-related noise pollution caused by road traffic, including speed reductions in many cases.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local Verkehrsclub Deutschland welcomes the widespread introduction of Tempo 30. However, the political leaders in the city are not innocent of the fact that this has to happen, because they have only contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise by neglecting regular bus traffic with thinned cycles and by little commitment to cycling, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the city's participation in the Energy and Climate Protection Agency Pforzheim/Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: Also on the agenda is the accession to the climate protection pact of the state of Baden-Württemberg, the revision of the parental contributions in the municipal day-care facilities and the application for inclusion in the federal Smart City funding.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must observe corona protection measures.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with a lot of delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: After a delay of almost half a year, Tim Zimmermann will start his debut season in the ADAC GT Masters on 31 July.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can start regular operations, the first test drives were now scheduled.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, it was all about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: For a long time, the Corona crisis prevented Tim Zimmermann from taking his first official drive in the new Lamborghini Huracan of Grasser Racing.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: This was now possible under special hygienic conditions.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old from Langenargen did his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his debut in a GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: "With the ABS, for example, you have to go into the corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a lot of fun."
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite being only 25 years old, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT racing and was able to help his new team-mate in many ways.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series brings new challenges," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I get on brilliantly and we have also made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.15: It is exactly there - at the Lausitzring - that the GT Masters will also hold its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From 31 July, the 33 supercars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: But Zimmermann, who is one of 15 newcomers to the series, knows the track.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: He was last a guest at the Motodrom in 2015.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track very much," says Zimmermann, who competes for the Friedrichshafen racing association Graf Zeppelin.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: "The Lausitzring has many fast sections that you have to hit perfectly in order to be fast."
schwaebische.de.113555.21: We'll find out in two weeks how fast Zimmermann really is.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course, the teams play a bit of poker during the tests," he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: "In the end, however, we are very satisfied and are looking forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a tightly packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: There are seven races until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current status is that no spectators will be allowed - but there is a celebrity guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: In mid-August at the Nürburgring, ex-Formula 1 driver Niko Hülkenberg will take to the GT steering wheel.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British transport minister caught cold by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The British government's decision to quarantine holidaymakers in Spain for two weeks after their return has caught the country's transport minister cold, according to press reports.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: Accordingly, Grant Shapps is currently on holiday in Spain, of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the rising coronavirus numbers in Spain, the cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry is possible without quarantine requirements.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new rule applies from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to quarantine on his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But the rule applies to those who are just on holiday on the deadline, only from Saturday, 1 August, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Incidentally, Spain is still considered one of the "safe countries" in Austria, for which no quarantine is required in Austria.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Numerous ministers must have known in advance that there was a possibility of a quarantine being imposed on holidaymakers to Spain," commented Labour MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently no one bothered to tell Grant Shapps."
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Almost a month after the end of the corona emergency in Spain and the expiry of the strict curfew, the number of infections in the country is rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists blame the nightlife in particular for the renewed spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of the favourite holiday destinations of the British.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government currently advises against non-essential travel to mainland Spain, with the exception of the Canary Islands and the Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: So far, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been registered in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: On the occasion of Navy Day in his country, Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced that warships will be equipped with the most modern hypersonic weapons.
mz-web.de.376126.3: With these weapons, which are unique in the world, the combat capabilities of the Russian naval forces will be expanded, Putin said on Sunday in St. Petersburg at the central naval parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: The Defense Ministry also informed the Interfax agency about successful tests of the Zircon hypersonic missile built for the Navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of around 343 meters per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Underwater Tropedeo continues to be built
mz-web.de.376126.8: The nuclear-capable underwater torpedo Poseidon will also continue to be built, it said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is designed to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who himself rode on a military boat, said that this year alone, 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual fleet associations of the largest country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has more coastline than any other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: For 300 years, the navy has reliably protected Russia, Putin said at the day celebrated by sailors nationwide.
mz-web.de.376126.13: The naval forces also celebrated Navy Day with parades in many other Russian coastal locations.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting on the side of ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated its strength at a weapons show in the Mediterranean port of Tartus.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video released by the Ministry of Defense showed not only warships, including a submarine, but also attack helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane "Hanna" reaches Texas: Aid hampered by corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this year's Atlantic season has made landfall in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rains are now threatening parts of the US state, the National Hurricane Center of the US climate agency NOAA announced on Sunday night (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for numerous counties.
tt.com.149061.5: The coronavirus pandemic raging in Texas is making the work of aid workers more difficult, Abbott said, according to US media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Every hurricane is a tremendous challenge," Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle.
tt.com.149061.8: Referring to the hurricane in Texas, he added: "This challenge is complicated and is compounded when you consider that it is sweeping through an area that is the most affected by Covid-19 in the state."
tt.com.149061.9: According to Johns Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died in Texas alone as a result of the coronavirus pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott urged people who had to leave their homes to be cautious.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices "to which we have become accustomed," such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It was important that everyone kept their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms were also provided in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, emergency shelters should be tested for corona.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage was initially reported only from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, "Hanna" made landfall on Padre Island just off the Texas coast, according to authorities.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to the lowest level one hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: A storm surge warning was initially issued for the coastal section from Port Mansfield to Sargent and was later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected it to weaken as Hanna moved further inland and headed toward northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, Hurricane Douglas was heading towards Hawaii on Sunday night with wind speeds of around 150 kilometres per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: The hurricane center, however, expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it should be near the largest islands of Hawaii on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: Over the Atlantic, NOAA expected an above-average active hurricane season this year, according to a forecast from May.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes are to be expected, of which up to six could become very strong hurricanes, the agency had declared.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into major storms.
tt.com.149061.28: In view of available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, and the probability of a below-average season is only 10 percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: US President Donald Trump wrote on Twitter that his government was closely monitoring the storms and was in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals disallowed: Video assistant "punishes" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic had two goals disallowed
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Napoli - Four goals scored, four goals disallowed: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a pitch-black evening at 0:2 (0:1) at SSC Napoli in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry with the referee's video assistant.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: "A festival of missed goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: Never before has VAR come down so hard on a team," commented Corriere dello Sport.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Hosts Napoli had taken the lead through a goal from full-back Elseid Hisaj in the 8th minute, with Filip Djuricic initially celebrating the equaliser in the 32nd minute.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) took the goal back because of an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later, Djuricic shot the ball into the net again - again the VAR intervened.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: Also the goals of attacker Francesco Caputo (50th) and Domenico Berardi (61st) were taken back by the refereeing team after advice from the VAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In injury time, Allan made the 2-0 final score for Napoli and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: "The VAR is worse for Sassuolo than a radar trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology is setting records," writes the "Gazzetta dello Sport."
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began with a setback for double winners FC Bayern.
wn.de.700404.3: Hansi Flick, who has recovered "fairly well" after a short holiday and a few days of training, has to consider after the first team training session how he can rebuild his successful defence after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfield boss Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury to the root of his left foot and is in danger of missing crucial top-class duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In Munich's filthy weather, the right-back abandoned a training match and was driven off the pitch in a golf cart.
wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular has to pause in the fight for the title is open.
wn.de.700404.7: An appearance in the second leg of the round of 16 against Chelsea on 8 August is likely to be difficult, but the 24-year-old can hope for the final tournament, which begins on 12 August in Lisbon.
wn.de.700404.8: However, the Bavarians do not want to let the mishap from Sunday's training stop them.
wn.de.700404.9: In his personal triple formula, Flick named the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on their way to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: Quality, intensity and concentration should show his victory-hungry title collectors in the ideally following 28 days until the premier class final on 23 August.
wn.de.700404.11: "We simply mastered the mandatory tasks with the championship and the cup excellently.
wn.de.700404.12: Now we have to create something special," said Flick.
wn.de.700404.13: Until the Munich team can concretely deal with the final tournament and before that a training camp in the Algarve, the first duty is the round of 16 against FC Chelsea.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3-0 in the first leg before the Corona break, the Londoners should not become Bayern's nightmare again in their home arena as in the lost "Finale dahoam" in 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: "We have to go through the door first.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and gain confidence with a good game," demanded Flick.
wn.de.700404.17: A test to get in the mood will be on Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: With a long speech, Flick had sworn his stars, who had 13 days of vacation after the double, to a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He welcomed 31 players to Säbener Straße, including the new players around Edel-Einkauf Leroy Sané, who met all his new colleagues on the pitch for the first time after his move from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: "Like all newcomers, Leroy has fitted in well," reported Flick.
wn.de.700404.21: But instead of talking about the new season, when Sané & Co. are no longer only allowed to train, Flick preferred to talk about the current title project of the German series champion.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of individual and small group training, they are now training as a team for the Londoners, who, unlike the Flick ensemble, are in the rhythm of the game.
wn.de.700404.23: After that, Munich could face a quarter-final against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, while Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus are possible opponents in the semi-finals.
wn.de.700404.24: A path to the final in Lisbon "is not so easy," stressed the head coach, who will be able to rely on the services of his new assistant Miroslav Klose in training from Tuesday.
wn.de.700404.25: The World Cup record scorer Klose and Flick know from many a joint tournament preparation what is particularly important in the 0-to-100 attunement.
wn.de.700404.26: Working with his current team is "a pleasure," praised Flick.
wn.de.700404.27: The "focus on winning" is an impressive trait of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: The tournament with nine-man teams was also ambitious on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.29: Of the top performers, all were there, including Thiago, who wants to leave, and defender David Alaba, whose stay beyond the premier league season is not guaranteed.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to crown its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to race on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise in order to award the world titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: All American races, however, were cancelled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Race calendar becomes more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The race calendar for the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten Grand Prix confirmed so far, three more racetracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, there will be races at the Nürburgring in Germany and in Portimão, Portugal.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for World Championship points at the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: As things stand, the 2020 racing calendar thus comprises 13 rounds.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are pleased that we continue to make great progress in finalising our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula 1 boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to finish its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar is to be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, performances in Vietnam and Malaysia at the end of November could take place before the already officially targeted races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, the regulations of Formula 1 require at least races on three continents for the award of the world championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, only two continents are raced on, there should be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles citing "extraordinary circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the impending coronavirus crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be in America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation met with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil will not take place.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We're looking forward to being back with them next season," Carey said.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races was met with criticism, especially in Brazil: "The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for it," said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: For example, the number of infections in the São Paulo area is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: In addition, the concerns of some teams about not wanting to race in Brazil would not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: They are prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's well-known late-night show via video link and revealed in the interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US late-night show via video link.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she told of her struggle against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also spoke about her famous "evil eye" during her encounter with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - In the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has attracted attention with her tireless work for the "Fridays For Future" movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke in a well-known latenight show about her plans in the future as well as her encounter with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Late-night host Stephen Colbert welcomed the 17-year-old Thunberg to his show on Tuesday and conducted a lengthy interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: She was shocked by "how far people go to shift the focus away from the climate crisis."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: She has experienced "everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children takes to the streets."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: She finds heads of state and leading politicians who mock her on social media or even try to silence her "funny" because they show her the reactions "because they have no other answer to it."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview when Greta Thunberg was asked about a well-known scene in which she gave US President Trump a bitter look.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the 2019 UN Climate Summit in New York, for which the activist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was captured by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip was turned into a GIF, an animated image that eventually became one of the most frequently used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think of the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To the relatively open question of Stephen Colbert, she answered only briefly and dryly: "To be honest, I don't think that needs any further explanation."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not expected the quick-witted answer and disappeared from the picture with a short laugh.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her "How dare you?" speech about the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.
morgenpost.de.276366.1: Ex-Dortmund player Immobile scores hat-trick for Lazio
morgenpost.de.276366.2: Ciro Immobile is now level with Bayern's Robert Lewandowski in the race for Europe's Golden Boot.
morgenpost.de.276366.3: Former Dortmund player Ciro Immobile still has the best chance of becoming the top scorer in the Italian football championship.
morgenpost.de.276366.4: The former BVB player scored three goals in Lazio's 5-1 (1-1) win at Hellas Verona, including two converted penalties in injury time in both halves.
morgenpost.de.276366.5: Two games before the end of the season, the 30-year-old from the fourth place in the table now has 34 season goals to his credit - the same number scored by Robert Lewandowski of FC Bayern Munich in the past Bundesliga season.
morgenpost.de.276366.6: In Italy, Cristiano Ronaldo follows with 30 goals so far, the Portuguese superstar met with the leader in the evening against Sampdoria Genoa.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green has died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a roller coaster ride: after a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly up again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Genius guitarist, drug junkie, cult follower: The co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members said in an official statement on Saturday, and a further statement would be announced in the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton praised Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: In an emotional reaction, Mick Fleetwood spoke of a "monumental loss" for all past and present members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: Drummer Fleetwood and guitarist Green founded the now legendary band in London in 1967, and his dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross" remains unforgettable to this day.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life ("The End Of The Game," "In The Skies") was like a roller coaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac, Green experienced a rapid rise - but the band celebrated its greatest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: Among other things, there is said to have been a dispute because Green wanted to donate all the group's profits to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to appear in broad robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Mental health problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Just three years after forming, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.15: This was followed by a social decline.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues-rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, according to biographers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: For much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived on the streets at times, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent some time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a working-class Jewish family in Bethnal Green, London.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: From a young age, he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven, he learned his first guitar chords.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager began to play the guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to be on stage as lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: A little later he was hired as a replacement for his idol Eric Clapton in the Bluesbreakers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the midst of the blues boom, Green formed Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 with fellow Bluesbreakers Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross," composed by Green, gave the group their first number 1 hit in the winter of 1968/69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its dark side: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that has happened to me in my life is the drugs - the best thing was to land a number 1 hit."
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green scored a surprise hit in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Meanwhile, Fleetwood Mac swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until he started again in 1996 with a group of musician friends.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: At the time, the British "Daily Telegraph" spoke of a rock star returning to earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band broke up in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his gentle sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
